title: Reformation of the Deadbeat Noble - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manhwa   Age Progression   Awkward Protagonist   Battle Academy   Beast Companions   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Dreams   Elves   European Ambience   Familial Love   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Knights   Late Romance   Male Protagonist   Mercenaries   Mysterious Past   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Orcs   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Religions   Rivalry   Romantic Subplot   Slow Growth at Start   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Time Skip   Transplanted Memories   Weak to Strong   Younger Sisters
author: 이등별
description:
Airn Pareira is a boy who sleeps to run away from reality.

People mocked him, calling him a ‘deadbeat’, but he had no wish to change.

Until one day, he dreamt of a swordsman… It was a dream about a talentless man who had been training by swinging his sword for decades.>
